title: ILM - knowledge sharing
description: Experience teaches quite a few things, experience when documented can act as knowledge for others. Documenting the experiences in the technological landscape. As a bunch of technology enthusiasts we help ourselves and others in their quest of technology.

home.title: ILM
home.description: Aim of this blog is to document experiences and solutions which would aid others in the journey. You would find information on Data Engineering | Data Architecture | Azure/AWS Cloud | Front End Javascript Frameworks React/Angular | Back End Engineering | Docker | Kubernetes.
